title: The perils of writing a disk images on windows
text: This is a story about how we had to go into the guts of Windows to figure out how to write to a USB drive with JavaScript without getting a permission error. But let's take it from the top.

title: Big changes to resin sync, update your CLI!
text: In the upcoming, 5.0.0 release of the resin-cli we are adding a number of changes that will enhance your resin sync experience. It will, however, be also a breaking change!
